name: Union
title: union.build
shortDescription: Union is designed to revolutionize the way applications interact across different blockchain environments. It offers a robust protocol for subsecond messaging and application-specific transfers, catering to developers and enterprises looking to enhance interoperability in a decentralized ecosystem. Example use case includes facilitating real-time data exchange between different blockchain platforms without compromising on security or efficiency.
pros: Supports multiple VMs including EVMs and SVMs
Highly interoperable with various execution environments
cons: May require understanding of various blockchain technologies
Limited information on user support and community
